title: This Smells
subtle: Concept (fiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile 30L
description: This Smells! is a delightful story about the various adjectives that can be used to describe the way things smell. Detailed illustrations and repetitive text support early emergent readers. In addition to working on decoding skills, students will have the opportunity to compare and contrast as well as to connect to prior knowledge to better understand the text.
reviewWords: bad, clean, dirty, smells, sour, sweet
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast ideas from a text
awareness: Initial and Final Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /s/ sound
phonics: Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Ss
grammar: Periods                : Identify and use periods correctly to end sentences
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
